ygData.subject: Re: Another bard guide idea
ygData.msgSnippet: - ... I think it would be a splendid idea! I know  I would surely appreciate non bards knowing a bit more about how we can help them..and how they can best
ygData.messageBody:
->
>Most of the info that would need to be in this guide has already been
>written (or still in John Kim's head). Pulling it out of the archives
>though will be a pain. How we go about actually creating the guide can be
>worked out later if enough people, especially the key posters on this list,
>agree that its a good idea.
>
>Let me know what you think.
>
>Galtin of E'ci
>
I think it would be a splendid idea! I know I would surely appreciate non
bards knowing a bit more about how we can help them..and how they can best
benefit by our presence (GRIN)..and what spell songs CAN anf CANNOT
do..there are many myths which overrate and undercut our abilities..and many
nuances only a bard would understand...


Elyana Silvanae
Ambassador to the Ridgerunners
Bardess of the 40th chorus ( at last! whoo hoo!)
Innoruuk Sever
